name: selective coating, copper sheet, black majic | selective coat, copper sheet, black majic | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/2149/documentation

Inventory for selective coatings of solar absorbers.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

The activity starts with the sheet entering the process. The material on which this activity is applied it is not included as input.

Gate to gate inventory for the process including infrastructure, wastes. No information for packages.
category: C:Manufacturing/25:Manufacture of fabricated metal products, except machinery and equipment/259:Manufacture of other fabricated metal products; metalworking service activit/2592:Treatment and coating of metals; machining

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Black Majic crystal coating with nickel underlay.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: None This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography US. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.

flow.name: Water
flow.category: Elementary flows/Emission to water/unspecified

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
Questionnaire
Calculated based on literature, (Vionnet, S., Quantis Water Database - Technical Report, 2012). The process starts when untreated surface enters the coating plant. It includes the processes: pre-treatment (cleaning) and coating itself. The source presents data on general "Automotive painting, electrocoating, per m2", without specification of what kind of surface is being coated and what kind of coat is used. It is assumed (expert opinion) that this data are more likely to be right then the original - ecoivent values.
